name: Kyoei Toshi
storyline:
This is not the story of a hero—. It is your story.

How does a human without any special powers survive the threat of a desperate situation brought about by the giant shadows approaching the city?

The protagonist of this game is not a hero with special powers, but he is a great man burdened with a big mission. A normal human that you can find anywhere… that is the protagonist of this game. He will sometimes cooperate with and sometimes oppose his fellow humans while accomplishing his purpose in surviving the threat of the danger that relentlessly approaches. This is a depiction of the threat and drama that unfolds at the feet of the giant shadows.
summary: Disaster Report-esque game starring villains from disaster movies.
